definition: to fawn on/to curry favor with/to make up to
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
lymphatic node/lymph gland
to manage with difficulty/only just getting by/in a difficult position
to flatter someone in a hundred different ways/assiduous fawning (idiom)

sentences.english: We didn't like him, as he always fawned on the rich.
sentences.chinese: 我们不喜欢他，因为他老是巴结有钱人。

sentences.english: Nodal NK-cell lymphoma are quite rare.
sentences.chinese: 在淋巴结中，NK细胞淋巴瘤很少。

sentences.english: Objective:To explore CT features and diagnostic value of castleman disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨巨淋巴结增生症的CT表现及诊断价值。

sentences.english: Many distant relatives fawned on the rich old man.
sentences.chinese: 远亲都来巴结这位有钱的老人。

sentences.english: He tried to wriggle round the man with money,but he failed.
sentences.chinese: 他试着用钱巴结那个人，可是失败了。

sentences.english: He fawns on his rich uncle.
We didn't like him, as he fawned on anyone in an influential position.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢他，因为他爱巴结有权势的人。

sentences.english: Many flattering relatives fawned on the rich old man.
sentences.chinese: 许多好谄媚的亲戚支巴结那个富有的老人。

sentences.english: Objective To identify intraoperatively the feasibility of lymphatic mapping with methylene.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究亚甲蓝术中定位胃癌前哨淋巴结的可行性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate an effective method for detecting lymphatic micrometastasis in gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨检测胃癌淋巴结微转移的有效方法。

sentences.english: Large lymph node swellings must be drained.
sentences.chinese: 淋巴结肿大很可能消除。

sentences.english: Indirect sign including carotid lymphnode enlargement was found.
sentences.chinese: 同时可发现颈淋巴结肿大征象。

sentences.english: They could also have enlarged lymph nodes, lethargy and vertigo.
sentences.chinese: 他们还可能有淋巴结肿大，嗜睡和眩晕等症状。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the D-limonene on the clinical impact of lymph node breast cancer and research.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨右旋柠烯对乳腺癌淋巴结转移的影响。

sentences.english: Did cheeper get mesentery lymph node how cure?
sentences.chinese: 幼儿得了肠系膜淋巴结怎么医治呢？

sentences.english: Unilateral inguinal lymphadenopathy is usually a response to infection of an ipsilateral lower extremity.
sentences.chinese: 单侧腹股沟区淋巴结肿大常是单侧下肢感染的反应。

definition: to fawn on/to flatter/to ingratiate oneself/flattery
to get the desired outcome/to win favor by fawning on sb/to curry favor with/a fruitful outcome to reward one's labor
to flatter/to fawn on/to butter sb up/toadying/bootlicking
to smooth whiskers and pat a horse's bottom (idiom); to use flatter to get what one wants/to toady/boot-licking
to ingratiate oneself with/to pander to
to seek contact with sb for one's own benefit/to suck up to sb
to fawn on/to ingratiate oneself/(literary) to meet face to face
to worm one's way into being friends with sb (usually derogatory)
flattering and fawning (idiom)/sweet-talking
toadying for personal gain/to curry favor/to study in great depth
to throw one's weight around/to put on airs
to be particularly attentive to (an attractive young lady or man etc)/to fawn upon (an influential politician etc)/to court sb's favor/to ingratiate oneself
see 扳龍附鳳|扳龙附凤[ban1 long2 fu4 feng4]
to put on airs/to assume great airs
to fawn on/to kiss up to
to put on airs/to be ostentatious
